data.title: Introduction to Acrylics: Paint What you Love ~ Bundle Series with guest artist Tania Dirks
data.meta_description: Join us for this brand new series, designed for the beginner, as well as those wanting to brush up on their skills. In this series, you will be guided in learning the foundational skills of painting with acrylics by artist Tania Dirks. A great opportunity to find your style and voice through both stroke and color application. Lessons include, toning & color blocking, creating visual rhythm & movement in composition, layering & highlighting, & when to stop. Tania will support your learning by sharing acrylic art theory each week. All art tools & materials you’ll need for the series are provided, including a starter set of acrylic paints by Liquitex and your choice of a 16”x20” or 12x16” canvas. Just bring an inspirational subject to paint. No experience needed.
data.text:
Join us for this brand new series, designed for the beginner, as well as those wanting to brush up on their skills.

In this series, you will be guided in learning the foundational skills of painting with acrylics by artist Tania Dirks. A great opportunity to find your style and voice through both stroke and color application. Lessons include, toning & color blocking, creating visual rhythm & movement in composition, layering & highlighting, & when to stop. Tania will support your learning by sharing acrylic art theory each week.

All art tools & materials you’ll need for the series are provided, including a starter set of acrylic paints by Liquitex and your choice of a 16”x20” or 12x16” canvas. Just bring an inspirational subject to paint.

No experience needed.
